param.name: @spacer
param.default: This module is one of the most popular free extensions from Joomlaspan.com. The ClickSafe version of this module is an Editor's Pick on the official Joomla! Directory.
param.label: THANK YOU

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: joomlaspan_ad_css
param.label: Div CSS codes
param.description: Input any css code that you want here. By default, width and height are autoadjusted based on the ad format that you choose.

param.name: joomlaspan_ad_client
param.label: Publisher ID
param.description: Please type your Publisher ID provided by Google AdSense. It is an alphanumerical string like pub-123456789876543

param.name: joomlaspan_ad_channel
param.label: Channel number
param.description: Type the channel number that you may have set in Google AdSense. It is a numerical string like 54656789 and NOT any text string that you can choose.

param.name: joomlaspan_ad_type
param.label: Ad Type
param.description: Choose the ad types you would like to display on your page. If you are choosing Image Ads only option, plase use only these sizes: 728X90 - Leaderboard, 468X60 - Banner, 300X250 - Medium Rectangle, 160X600 - Wide Skyscraper and 120X600 - Skyscraper

param.name: joomlaspan_ad_uifeatures
param.label: Corner Styles
param.description: Optionally, choose from one of the pre-designed corner styles.

param.name: joomlaspan_ad_format
param.label: Ad layout
param.description: Choose the ad format and size that you would like to display on your page.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: OPTIONAL
param.description: These parameters are optional. Leave these blank if you are not sure.

param.name: joomlaspan_alternate_ad_url
param.label: Alternate Ad URL
param.description: Alternate Ad URL to specify other ads when no ads are available.

param.name: joomlaspan_alternate_color
param.label: Alternate Color
param.description: Alternate color when no ads are available, in hex, without #
